author: andschwa
body:
Per this [issue](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/issues/1019) the behavior of `dotnet publish --output bin` is about to change on us (it already has on Windows).

We'll need to fix our scripts, Travis, and documentation to account for this, but ideally the change is rolled back. I really prefer having `./bin/powershell` as the output.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Looks like we may instead get lucky on this. David Fowler is "will make it the way it was."

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: This is temporarily worked around via 188598e4caf9cf87b5b32df3b272ec96cf5d4633.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: To fix this, we're just waiting to test a new [package](http://apt-mo.trafficmanager.net/repos/dotnet/pool/main/d/dotnet-nightly/).

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Newest packages appear to have resolved this, now we need to remove the work-around.

title: Remove workaround of previous dotnet-publish behavior
